Scoundrel's Philosophy.name: Scoundrel's Philosophy
Scoundrel's Philosophy.flavor: You humble your foe with your fighting prowess, then befuddle it with your vast knowledge of proper fighting techniques.
Scoundrel's Philosophy.onHit: 3[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and make a secondary attack against the target.
Scoundrel's Philosophy.secondaryOnHit: The target is dazed until the end of your next turn.

Every Trick in the Book.name: Every Trick in the Book
Every Trick in the Book.flavor: You attack from all angles, using every technique and bit of knowledge you have to defeat your foe.
Every Trick in the Book.attack: Dexterity vs. AC, Fortitude, Reflex, Will. You make one attack roll and compare the result against all four defenses. A target suffers the effect associated with each defense that the attack hits.
Every Trick in the Book.onHit (Fortitude): 1[W] damage, and the target is slowed (save ends).
Every Trick in the Book.onHit (Reflex): 1[W] damage, and you knock the target prone.
Every Trick in the Book.onHit (Will): 1[W] damage, and the target is dazed (save ends).
Every Trick in the Book.effect: You shift 3 squares + 1 square for each defense you hit.

Always a Natural.name: Always a Natural
Always a Natural.flavor: You are a natural at everything you do.
Always a Natural.trigger: You make a skill check and dislike the result
Always a Natural.effect: You reroll the triggering check and use either result.
